import axios from"axios";class ProvaApi{constructor(){var _this=this;this.axiosClient=axios.create();this.makeRequest=async function(url){let includeTimestamp=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:true;try{let fullUrl="https://corsproxy.io/?https://www.fotmob.com/".concat(url);if(includeTimestamp){const timestamp=new Date().getTime();fullUrl+="".concat(url.includes('?')?'&':'?',"_=").concat(timestamp);}const response=await _this.axiosClient({method:"GET",url:fullUrl});return response;}catch(error){console.error(error);throw error;}};this.makeSearch=async url=>{try{const fullUrl="https://corsproxy.io/?https://apigw.fotmob.com/".concat(url);const response=await this.axiosClient({method:"GET",url:fullUrl,headers:{'Cache-Control':'no-cache'}});return response;}catch(error){// console.error(error);
throw error;}};}}export default ProvaApi;
